document_name_accent: ung thu dai trang giai doan 1.json
document_title: Stage 1 colon cancer: Signs, diagnosis and treatment
subsection_content: Stage 1 colon cancer is cancer that has grown through the submucosa, muscle lining of the colon or into the muscle wall but has not grown further. There is no cancer in the lymph nodes.
subsection_title: ung thu dai trang giai doan 1.json. What is stage 1 colon cancer?
subsection_data:
ung thu dai trang giai doan 1.json. What is stage 1 colon cancer?
Stage 1 colon cancer is cancer that has grown through the submucosa, muscle lining of the colon or into the muscle wall but has not grown further. There is no cancer in the lymph nodes.
